mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manager (manager_id, pwd, sido, gugun, address, name, position) VALUES(#{manager_id}, #{pwd}, #{sido}, #{gugun}, #{address}, #{name}, #{position})
mapper.update: UPDATE manager SET position=#{position}, sido=#{sido}, gugun=#{gugun}, address=#{address} WHERE manager_id=#{manager_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM manager WHERE sido=#{sido} AND gugun=#{gugun}
